Yes, I'm still going on about this.

As some of you will be aware, I've been having an on-going battle (namely trying to kill it for good) with the command box ever since discovering Quest about 15 months ago.

Some CSS, JS and functions successfully hide this thing on first load of a game, but not on resume of a save.

Anyway, it's just occurred to me that this command box - or more to the point the border which surrounds it - must be controlled in the game's core somewhere. As naive as this question may be, can I simply not delete the section of code which controls the command box border?

Or is that game code outsiders don't have access to?
